title: Lot of 50 T206 HOFers - SOLD (Or Auctioned)
author: T206Collector

posts.post_title: Lot of 50 T206 HOFers - SOLD (Or Auctioned)
posts.post_content:
Made too many purchases in REA and Memory Lane, so I have to sell off most of the HOFers in my T206 set.... and fast!  All three Lajoies, all three Evers, all three Chances, and a nice Speaker (albeit with back damage) included!  My loss, your gain, so they say!  :D

 PayPal f/f preferred.  Prices are delivered.  Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested!

Thanks for looking!

I really appreciate all of the interest today.  The few remaining cards have been moved to eBay and Net54 Auction Thread.
